page.title: 09CARS IN WILMSLOW
page.content: CAR OWNERSHIP In a{survey}in Lindow Primary School we found that 98% of fathers can drive cars,80% of mothers drive, 97% of the families own a car and 52% of the families own more than one car. A WILMSLOW GARAGE There are four garages in the area, North Cheshire Garages is one of the larger. In 1945 the repair shop first opened, today about 10 people work there. The workshop opens at 8.30am. The mechanics repair about 100 cars a week. The car showrooms opened in 1950, at that time they sold very few cars. Now they sell about 14 cars a week, although they only have 8 cars displayed in the showroom.The Vauxhall Cavalier is their best selling car this year.The cheapest car is the Vauxhall Astra which costs Â£4949.
